name: SQL Exception
description: This is an example of SQL exception. Enable This problem pattern and then try to create new account.

name: External Call Exception
description: This is an example of an exception occuring during an external call

name: Slow Login
description: This Problem will try to simulate slow login behavior for a specific user. Enable this problem pattern and then try to login with username: khalid and password: admin

name: Service Queue
description: This is an example service queueing. You can observe the problem in the Active Service Equalizer graph. Note: This problem pattern requires iCheck to be up and running.

name: Dead Lock
description: A Dead Lock Example. You can see the threads status in the Thread dashboard. Please do not overuse this problem because it will result in multi dead-locked threads

name: Method Exception
description: Example showing custom method exception. Enable this pattern and then head to the Rooms list page in the iHotel app. Filter the rooms by selecting the 3 Room Apartment. For this problem to work you will need the enable the enable_method_exception_event advanced option
